name: Street Sniper Fire
description:
Relentless terrorists are threatening the peace of the city. As an army sniper, you must stop the destruction of terrorists, save the city and the people. Pick up your sniper rifle aiming to shoot and destroy all the terrorists in the city. Complete the mission assigned by the army.

Features:
- Real 3D battlefield environment
- HD graphics
- amazing music and sound effects
- all kinds of high quality sniper rifles
- first person shooting perspective
- Radar system makes it easier for you to find your target
- Can play anytime, anywhere
- a large number of challenging dangerous missions
- perfect sniper experience
